sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import Entete from "../../components/entete/entete"; class PageProfil extends React.Component{ state = { adresseMail : "", pseudonyme : "", biographie : "", photo : "", sexe : "" } componentDidMount = () =>{ // Envoyer l'id const send = "http://localhost:8000/getProfil/" const iDtoSend = localStorage.id axios.get(send+iDtoSend) .then(reponse => { console.log(reponse) // Récupérer les states const myuser = { adresseMail: reponse.data.user.adresseMail, pseudonyme: reponse.data.user.pseudonyme, biographie: reponse.data.user.biographie, photo: reponse.data.user.photo, sexe: reponse.data.user.sexe, createdAt: reponse.data.user.createdAt, updatedAt: reponse.data.user.updatedAt, created : reponse.data.user.created } // remplacer le state par celui créé this.setState(myuser) }) } render(){ return( <>
Profil
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Sexe
) } } export default PageProfil
